body.p: Tapestry source code is stored in Apache's Subversion repository.
For read-only access, the repository URL is http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/
Tapestry source code is stored in the jakarta/tapestry/ using the traditional branches, tags and trunk folders (trunk contains the very latest code).
Tapestry commiter's (with SVN update access) should use the repository URL https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/
You may also access the Tapestry source code via the web interface: http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/jakarta/tapestry/trunk/.
Directions for build Tapestry from source are on the Tapestry Wiki
